p: The TaKaRa (TaKaRa Corp Ltd, Dalian, China) was the contracted company responsible for sequencing the amplicons. We generated a phylogenetic tree using the Neighbor-joining (NJ) method in MEGA 4 (MegAlign, DNASTAR Software Suite, Version 7.1.0, Copyright 1989-2006, DNASTAR Inc.). The Bootstrap values were calculated from 1,000 repeats using 70% as the cut-off.
